name: Wild Wild Women Online Trivia | Mixed People | 10 Questions

questions.text: This woman was famous (in part) for a lifelong relationship with Jean Paul Sartre.
questions.explanation:
Simone de Beauvoir.

	It was de Beauvoir, a fellow existentialist.

questions.text: Mary Ann Evans wrote under the name of George Eliot. One of her novels was:
questions.explanation:
Silas Marner.

	Did everyone have to read this in high school or junior high?

questions.text: The woman who wrote a series of racy novels about a woman called 'Claudine'.
questions.explanation:
Colette.

	Colette wrote - and lived -racy. (Sand was involved with Chopin and De Musset.)

questions.text: Ayn Rand is as well known for her marriage-breaking affair as for her novels which describe a rugged brand of individualism. Which novel is NOT one of hers?
questions.explanation:
The Wealth of Nations.

	Her philosophy is controversial, but her novels are quite interesting.

questions.text: This woman is well-known for a long relationship with author Henry Miller.
A mysterious 'dark lady' was the subject of - and the possible inspiration for - poems that were written by
questions.explanation:
Shakespeare.

	The identity of the Dark Lady is a subject of speculation for Shakespearean scholars.

questions.text: Camille Claudel, a minor artist, was better known for her long affair with another artist:
Evelyn Nesbit was catapulted into the headlines when her(strange) husband shot a prominent architect named:
questions.explanation:
Stanford White.

	Thaw shot White and ended up in prison. See the movie ('The Girl in the Red Velvet Swing') with (a very young) Joan Collins and Ray Milland.

questions.text: The key figure in the Profumo scandal that rocked Great Britain in the second half of the 20th Century was
questions.explanation:
Christine Keeler.

	Keeler's involvement with Cabinet member Profumo was big stuff at the time.

questions.text: Everyone knows that Liz Taylor broke up Eddie Fisher's marriage to Debbie Reynolds. Who was Taylor's husband before Fisher?
questions.explanation:
Mike Todd.

	All are former husbands of Liz, but it was the death of Todd in a plane crash that led Fisher to console Liz. Fisher and Todd were good friends.
